{/* Hero Section with Slideshow */}

Empowering STEM Education Through Real-World Problem Solving

Join us in transforming education and creating the next generation of innovators.

{/* Serwaa Nyarko Success Story */}

Our Success at Serwaa Nyarko Girls' School

We implemented our hands-on STEM education model at Serwaa Nyarko Girls' School, leading to remarkable outcomes. Students developed innovative solutions to real-world problems, including:

    {["Waste segregation bins", "Biogas systems", "Adjustable tables and chairs from plastic waste", "Eco-friendly sanitary pad incinerators", "Solar-powered intruder detection systems"].map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

These projects not only enhanced the students' STEM skills but also had a direct positive impact on their school environment.

{/* Support Your School Section */}

Support Your School

{/* SHS Support Options */}

Senior High School (SHS)

Old students and parents can support SHS projects:

{[ { amount: "GHC 15,000", projects: 1 }, { amount: "GHC 25,000", projects: 2 }, { amount: "GHC 40,000", projects: 3 }, { amount: "GHC 50,000", projects: 5 }, ].map((tier, index) => (

{tier.amount}

for {tier.projects} project{tier.projects > 1 ? 's' : ''}

))}
{/* JHS Support Options */}

Junior High School (JHS)

Parents can support extra classes for JHS students:

Enroll your child in our problem-solving training program

{/* Post-Training Support */}

Scaling Up Success

Expert Support for School-Wide Implementation

After the initial training, we don't just leave schools on their own. Our team provides ongoing expert support to help schools replicate successful projects on a larger scale, benefiting the entire school community.

    {[ "Technical expertise for scaling up projects", "Guidance on sourcing materials and resources", "Workshops for teachers to integrate projects into curriculum", "Ongoing mentorship for student leaders" ].map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
{/* Community Impact */}

Community and Global Outreach

Expanding Our Reach

We're offering training to selected deprived and local communities for free, enabling youth to build solutions tailored to their community's needs.

{/* Innovation Quiz */}

Annual Innovation and Problem-Solving Quiz

Join our exciting competition where schools tackle real industry challenges and showcase their innovative solutions!

{/* Footer */}

© 2024 STEM Education Initiative. All rights reserved.
